title: The Blessing
itunes:title: The Blessing
description:
There is power in the spoken blessing. Its impact shapes and changes destinies. Find the biblical inspiration to speak blessing over your children and loved ones to activate God’s greatness in them as you discover greater depths of your heavenly Father’s love for you. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
